alert.note: Alert for Spokane Area; Upper Columbia Basin (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 12 at 3:38AM PST until January 13 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Clark Fork, Hayden, Harrington, Creston, Sandpoint, Schweitzer Mountain Road, Grand Coulee, Fairfield, Eastport, Athol, Airway Heights, Rockford, Davenport, Spokane Valley, Coeur d`Alene, Wilbur, Cheney, Post Falls, Downtown Spokane, Priest River, Coulee City, Worley, Odessa, Ritzville, and Bonners Ferry. * WHEN...Until noon PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
